TableDefinition.Name: Occupational scenario tasks
TableDefinition.Description: Table linking occupational tasks/activities to scenarios. I.e., describing what activities are part of a scenario, including details on task duration and other determinants (e.g., use of RPE), described via the contributing tasks relationship.

ColumnDefinition.Description: Reference to the task that is part of the scenario.
Duration of performing the task within this scenario.
Frequency with which the task is executed within this scenario, specified in number of times per day/week/etc. The resolution of the frequency is specified by the frequency resolution field.
Resolution of the specific task frequency (e.g. per day, per week, etc.).

ColumnDefinition.Name: RPE type
ColumnDefinition.Description: Type of RPE (e.g., None, RPE). If not specified then considered to be undefined.

ColumnDefinition.Name: Hand protection type
ColumnDefinition.Description: Type of hand protection (e.g., None, Gloves). If not specified then considered to be undefined.

ColumnDefinition.Name: Protective clothing type
ColumnDefinition.Description: Type of protective clothing (e.g., None, ProtectiveClothing). If not specified then considered to be undefined.
